Start: ^"Did you just come to disturb me?"
^The one-eyed man seems annoyed by your presence. He doesn't even look at you.
^"It will only take a moment. Tell all about Jack's murder."
Questions: ^"I told the boss everything I know. Jack snooped where he shouldn't have. He knew what he was signing up for."

c-0: ^"Such information is not free. I could tell you, but then I would lose valuable knowledge."
^"You better tell me. You'll soon lose your jobs if the port doesn't resume transport."
^"I'm not going to ask. Either you tell me, or we have two murders to solve."

c-2: ^"A favor with someone from the upper city? Sounds good."
c-3: ^"And I wish you that. The faster you do your job, the faster I'll get back to mine."

b: ^"What, no one told us that they could close the port for so long."
^"Be it to you. I'll tell you what I know. Then you'll go away and let me work."
^"No one dares to do that. Go disturb someone else."
^"Relax. There is no need for that. Let you be. I'll tell you what I know.
^"Be careful. You don't want to mess with me. Let me work in peace or you'll be out of this port faster than you got here."

QuestHelp: ^"Jack witnessed a transport that was destined for smugglers. The boss is in their debt and must provide them with everything they need."
^"Ralph had been wanting to reveal the truth for some time, but he knew that no one would believe him without evidence."
^"Or someone who, in the course of the investigation, comes to that conclusion himself."
^"If it was Ralph who killed Jack, he did it to get rid of the boss. And if he had nothing to do with it....
^"...The blame falls on your boss. He is the one who helped the smugglers."

c-0: ^"Here's the thing. Think about what you heard here and make the right decision. By the way, you can check the crates in the port. You might find something useful there."
^"Recently there was someone suspicious hanging around. Maybe he left some traces."
